Html:
• export function exports ALL tiles from default database(PrimaryCache) to a new fresh database, OR adds new tiles to existing database, nothing is overridden then.
  • import function just do export into default database(PrimaryCache).
p.s. you can manually manage tiles using http://www.yunqa.de/delphi/doku.php/products/sqlitespy/index

sorry I don't quite get it.

Can I somehow add the current view of the map to the cache and use export and import to load the map when offline?

Sorry for missunderstanding but all this is quite new to me =)
if you see the map it's already in the cache, yes you can export anytime, experiment ;}
